Experiment Method.Assay Method: Affinity purification, Mass spectrometry, Antibody development

Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using LRRK2 protein extracted from mouse brain tissue.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: reduced phosphorylation at S935, impaired 14-3-3 binding
Readout description.Result Description: The R1441G variant exhibited reduced phosphorylation at S935 and impaired 14-3-3 binding compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: reduced phosphorylation at S935, impaired 14-3-3 binding
Readout description.Result Description: The Y1699C variant exhibited reduced phosphorylation at S935 and impaired 14-3-3 binding compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: reduced phosphorylation at S935, impaired 14-3-3 binding
Readout description.Result Description: The G2019S variant exhibited reduced phosphorylation at S935 and impaired 14-3-3 binding compared to wild-type LRRK2.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were conducted across different ages and tissues to ensure biological replication.

Technical replicates.Description: Information on technical replicates is not provided in the input.

Basic positive control.Description: No specific information on positive controls was provided.

Basic negative control.Description: No specific information on negative controls was provided.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels at S935 and 14-3-3 binding comparable to wild-type LRRK2.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced phosphorylation at S935 and impaired 14-3-3 binding compared to wild-type LRRK2.
